meanings.definition: A group of trained personnel capable of assuming control and organizing an operation.
meanings.sent1: The cadres of firefighters quickly responded to the emergency.
meanings.sent2: The company's cadres of managers efficiently led the project to success.
meanings.sent3: The cadres of chefs in the kitchen made sure the food was cooked to perfection.
meanings.sent4: The cadres of teachers guided the students through the challenging curriculum.
meanings.sent5: The cadres of doctors worked together seamlessly to save lives in the hospital.

meanings.definition: A small group of people specially trained for a particular purpose or profession.
meanings.sent1: The cadres of artists showcased their paintings at the gallery.
meanings.sent2: The cadres of athletes trained hard for the upcoming competition.
meanings.sent3: The cadres of musicians entertained the crowd with their lively tunes.
meanings.sent4: The cadres of scientists conducted experiments in the laboratory.
meanings.sent5: The cadres of volunteers helped clean up the park for the community event.
